value:
$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Greetings to you, fine people of Askr.
And to you as well, Reginn, Princess
of Niðavellir.$k$pI am Jötunheimr's crown princess
and heir apparent, Nótt. It is my great
pleasure to meet you all.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Ooh, she's so elegant and refined...
She's the complete opposite of Dagr!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|Hey, keep that to yourself. You don't
have to shout it across the whol—
Er, heyyyy, Sis! Been a while, huh?$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...Hm? What is that buzzing sound?$k$pI thought for a moment I'd heard the
droning of a troublesome pest...$k$p$EFace_Cool|Well, you must be exhausted after
your arduous journey. Please do take
the remainder of the day to rest.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Thank you for your concern and
generosity, but we haven't the time
to delay.$k$pPlease forgive the directness of my
request, but we are in need of Gramr.
Are you willing to give it to us?$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face|But of course. Fáfnir's tyranny is
a concern for us Jötnar as well.$k$p$EFace_Cool|I will do all that is in my power
to assist you.$k$p$WmMPID_レギン,ch00_30_Reghin_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Wonderful! Thank you so much,
Princess Nótt!$k$pOnce we have it, I'll be able to stop
Fáfnir—and then we'll all be safe!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|What good news! After our run-in
with Dagr, I was worried, but Princess
Nótt is a good person after all!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|Hey, Sis... I was checking out the
fortresses on the way here, but...
they all looked pretty empty.$k$pCome to think of it, I didn't even see
ONE soldier the whole way.$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face|...And?$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face|Drop the act already. You've called
them here to the castle, haven't you?$k$p$Sbs5000|The idea of handing that sword over
never once crossed your mind! ...So?
I'm right, aren't I? Totally nailed it?$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Anger|...$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Gyahaha! I KNEW it! Your left eye
always twitches when you try to
cover up a lie.$k$pBut I'm sure you don't need me to
tell you that, right? *wink*$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Princess Nótt... What exactly do you
intend to do? What are you planning?$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Smile|*sigh* Why would you frighten the
poor things? I was hoping to simply
lop off their heads as they slept...$k$p$EFace_Pain|Please tell me you don't harbor some
ill-conceived affection for them, Dagr.
...You truly are a troublesome pest.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Princess Nótt!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Anger|If I'm a pest, then what does that
make you? You two-faced—$k$p$WmMEID_ノート,ch00_33_Nott_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Even the sound of your voice... I feel
I am being somehow infected by it
just listening to you.$k$pNow, I have important business to
attend to. You just sit there and be
quiet like a good girl for once.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Business? What do you mean?!$k$p$WmMEID_ダグ,ch00_34_Dagr_F_Normal,Face_Cool|Don't just stand there, Alfonse!
She's coming for you!$k$p$Sbs1000|
